original_text: Saul did not like this song. He became very angry. He thought, ‘The women say that David has killed tens of thousands of men. But they say that I have only killed thousands of men. They will soon want David to be their king.’
korean_text: 사울이 그 말에 불쾌하여 심히 노하여 이르되 다윗에게는 만만을 돌리고 내게는 천천만 돌리니 그가 더 얻을 것이 나라 말고 무엇이냐 하고

sentences.original_text: Saul did not like this song
'The women say that David has killed tens of thousands of men
sentences.korean_translation: 여인들은 다윗이 수만 명의 남자들을 죽였다고 말한다

sentences.original_text: But they say that I have only killed thousands of men
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 내가 수천 명의 남자들만 죽였다고 말한다

sentences.original_text: They will soon want David to be their king.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 곧 다윗을 그들의 왕으로 원할 것이다.'
